text: Atahpara musa yakhana ubhayera sakrake dharate udyata halena, takhana se byakti bale uthala [1], â€˜he musa! Gatakala tumi yemana eka byaktike hatya karecha, sebhabe amake'o ki hatya karate caccha? Tumi to yaminera buke sbecchacari hate caccha, tumi to ca'o na santi sthapanakaridera antarbhukta hate!â€™
